creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: three large, bold characters written horizontally; smaller, neatly written, vertical characters at far L (signature); large rectangular relief stamp URC; large square intaglio stamp center L edge; large square relief stamp LLC
markings: URC, rectangular relief seal; L center, square intaglio seal; LLC, square relief seal; on back R side, various markings
title: "Seemingly Clumsy" Studio
